name: fleshiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a lot of soft flesh: the growing fleshiness of his face The fleshiness of her youth has gone. See
fleshy
More examplesFewer examplesThe texture retains the creamy fleshiness of fresh shellfish.He was fifty years old, just beginning to slide into the comfortable fleshiness of middle age.the earthy fleshiness of the mushrooms
